name: UnicornPizza
0:
”Alexa play Unicorn Pizza.”
”Alexa open Unicorn Pizza.”
”Alexa start Unicorn Pizza.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unicorn pizza
des:
You are a Chef at the famous Unicorn Pizza Parlor!

Your job is to help the unicorns make pizza for the Magical Folk of Fairytale Land.
There are lots of characters who are hungry for pizza! See who you get to make pizza for.

Pick interesting combinations of pizza toppings and see if you get a good review!
Make three pizzas to complete a shift, the unicorns will promote you as you complete your shifts.
After two shifts, Unicorn Pizza Parlor closes for the day, get some rest and come back the next day!

****** NEW ******
Premium products now available for purchase:
• Monster pack - one time purchase
Adds lots of monster customers, together with their favourite disgusting pizza toppings!

• Open all Hours pack - one time purchase
Lets you play as many games each day as you want. Without the pack there's a two games a day limit.
*******************

Have fun!
Dusty, Sprinkles, Twinkle & Sparkle - the Unicorn Pizza team

Credits: 
Unicorn voices from 15.ai

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
